question: There are 90 fourth-graders at Sunny Hill School. 76 of them are girls. On Friday, 7 fourth-grade girls and 8 fourth-grade boys were absent. How many fourth grade boys were at Sunny Hill School on Friday?
answer:
Of the 90 fourth graders, 76 are girls, so 90 students - 76 girls = <<90-76=14>>14 boys.
On Friday there were 14 boys - 8 absent = <<14-8=6>>6 boys.
#### 6
